name: Downhill Deceits
description: Downhill Deceits is a fun game where you play as a quiet man on an orange bike who goes down because an old man told him to, and there are islands. Uncover this amazing story by following one rule: Go Down!
minimum_requirements: OS: Any remotely modern Windows OS Processor: Intel Atom Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Optional Storage: 125 MB available space Additional Notes: Certain text won't display correctly on 4:3 aspect ratios; 16:9 is recommended. '128 MB' refers to RAM free.
recommended_requirements: Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Something that can run 8x MSAA Additional Notes: For 8x MSAA, select 'Better?' when launching the game (There's literally no noticeable difference). '128 MB' refers to RAM free.
